name: Huehub
description: HueHub is a decentralized exchange (DEX) within the Nervos CKB ecosystem, built on the RGB++ protocol to facilitate trading of Bitcoin Layer 1 assets on the CKB blockchain. Launched to support assets like $SEAL, HueHub offers a marketplace for buying and selling RGB++ assets with compatibility for major Bitcoin wallets such as JoyID, Unisat, and OKX. It features a fair launch mechanism, ensuring equal participation opportunities, and supports seamless asset transfers between Bitcoin and CKB without cross-chain bridges, enhancing security and decentralization. HueHub plays a key role in advancing the CKB ecosystem by enabling efficient, low-cost trading and fostering DeFi adoption.

highlights.title: Fair Launch Mechanism
highlights.description: Ensures equal participation opportunities for all users during asset launches.

highlights.title: Low-Cost Trading
highlights.description: Offers efficient, cost-effective trading to enhance DeFi adoption in the CKB ecosystem.

related.title: UTXO Swap
related.desc: The first orderbook exchange for RGB++ assets on Bitcoin.

faq.q: What are the benefits of trading on HueHub?
faq.a: HueHub offers low-cost, efficient trading, enhancing security and promoting DeFi adoption in the CKB ecosystem.

faq.q: How does HueHub ensure fair participation?
faq.a: HueHub uses a fair launch mechanism to provide equal opportunities for all users during asset launches.
